S02n207:2: evaṃ mayā śru[tameka]samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma karīramaṇḍale ca |
S02n207:3: | atha khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo'nekavidyādharakoṭīniyutaśatasahastra[streṇa] parivṛto yena bhagavāṃstenopasamakrāmat |
S02n207:4: upasaṃkramya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavantaṃ pradakṣiṇīkṛtya [e]kānte nyasīda bhagavantametadavocat |
S02n207:5: idaṃ mama bhagavannekādaśamukhaṃ nāma hṛdayamekādaśabhiḥ [kalpako–] ṭībhirbhāṣitam |
S02n207:6: ahaṃ cettarhi bhāṣiṣyāmi sarva[sattvānā]marthāya hitāya sukhāya sarvavyādhipraśa[ma]nāya sarvapāpālakṣmiduḥsvapnapratinivāraṇāya sarvākālamṛtyupratinivāraṇāya aprasādānāṃ prasādanāya sarvavighnavināyakānāṃ praśamanāya |
S02n207:7: nā[haṃ] bhagavan samanupaśyāmi sadevake loke samārake sabrahmake saśramaṇabrāhmaṇikāyāḥ prajāyā yadanena hṛdayena rakṣe kṛte paritre parigra[he śā]ntisvastyayane daṇḍaparihare śastraparihare viṣa[prahā]ṇe kṛte yaḥ kaścidatikrame[t] na praśame[t] nedaṃ [sthā]naṃ vidyate sthāptya paurāṇāṃ karma vipacyate |
S02n207:8: tadasya ca kalpayato'bhiśraddadhataḥ sarveṇa sarvaṃ na bhaviṣyati |
S02n207:10: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavan gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa śatapadmanayanacūḍa–pratihataraṅgavela–kiraṇa[rājasya] nāma tathāgatasya |
S02n207:12: saha pratilaṃbhe[na] daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatāḥ sumukhībhūtā anutpattikadharmakṣāntipratilabdhāḥ |
S02n207:13: evaṃ bahukaro'yaṃ hṛdayam tasmāttarhi śrāddhena kulaputreṇa vā kuladuhitrā vā satkṛtyāyaṃ hṛdayaṃ sādhayitavyam |
S02n207:23: na viṣaṃ na garaṃ na jvaraṃ na śastraṃ kāye kramiṣyati |
S02n207:32: smarāmyahaṃ bhagavanniti daśānāṃ gaṅgānadīvālukāsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ tataḥ pareṇa paratareṇa mandāravagandho nāma tathāgato'bhūt |
S02n207:35: eṣa ca mayā hṛdayaṃ pravartitvā sa[rvasmi]n karuṇāyanajñānagarbhabodhisattvavimokṣaṃ prati[la]bdham |
S02n207:36: ye bandhanabaddhā ye badhyaprāptā ye udakāgnivividhaduḥkhābhyāhatāḥ tadanenāhaṃ sarvasattvānāṃ layanaṃ trāṇaṃ śaraṇaṃ parāyaṇaṃ bhavāmi |
S02n207:37: yat sarvaduṣṭayakṣarākṣasānāmanena hṛdayena karṣitvā maitracittā[n] dayācittān kṛtvānuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayāmi |
S02n207:38: evaṃ mahardhiko'yaṃ mama bhagavan [hṛdayam] ekavelāṃ prakāśitvā cattvāro mūlāpattayaḥ kṣa[yaṃ] gacchanti pacānantaryāṇi karmāṇi niravayavaṃ tanvīkariṣyanti |
S02n207:42: sarvamanorathaṃ paripūrayiṣyāmi yaśca caturdaśīpaṃcadaśī māmuddiśya upavasati |
S02n207:44: tena nā[madhe]yamapi grahaṇena bhagavan saha so'yaṃ buddhakoṭīniyut[śatasa]hasrātirekasamam |
S02n207:50: sādhu sādhu kulaputra yat sarvasattvānāmantike evaṃrūpā mahākaruṇā |
S02n207:51: śakṣyasi tvaṃ kulaputraḥ anenopāyena sarvasattvānā[manuttarā]yāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau pratiṣṭhāpayitum |
S02n207:54: tataḥ khalvāryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattva utthāyasanādekāṃsamuttarāsaṅga kṛtvā bhagavataścaraṇayoḥ praṇipatya idaṃ hṛdayamāvartayati sma |
S02n207:71: ime tile cile bhile khile svāhā |
S02n207:75: tadyathā ṭuru ṭuru hā hā hā hā svāhā |
S02n207:79: tadyathā thiri thiri dhiri dhiri svāhā |
S02n207:83: tadyathā sāde sāde sidi sidi sudu sudu svāhā |
S02n207:88: tadyathā yasi ddhasi cari huru icuruḥ suruḥ muruḥ svāhā |
S02n207:91: ragniṃ prajvālya dadhimadhudhṛtābhyaktānāmahorātrauṣikena ekena triṃśatā homaḥ kāryaḥ |
S02n207:93: namo ratnatrayāya nama āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākāruṇikāya |
S02n207:94: tadyathā ili mili tili tili hili svāhā |
S02n207:98: tadyathā piṭi piṭi tiṭi tiṭi viṭi viṭi gaccha gaccha bhagavānāryāvalokiteśvara svabhavanaṃ svabhavanaṃ svāhā |
